short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embrace the spirit of the samurai with Jin Sakai visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the world of Jin Sakai with our Ghost of Tsushima-themed live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek, samurai-inspired interface capturing the honor and elegance of Jin Sakai.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that reflects the serenity and strength of Tsushima.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Effortlessly navigate to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Engage with samurai-themed games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with tools inspired by the spirit of the samurai.
